Oh shit, I'm in a fucked up version of Twilight.

Just do what your best buddy told you.
You gotta find the Draven in you, she can't  resist your dravenic draveny and will leave her boyfriend immediately, since he isn't as draven. And physiology doesn't matter, Draven always finds a way.

Just make sure that she never meets your best buddy. He will probably steal her.

I’m always watching my back to make sure I don’t get axed.

the young man hath offered himself up through metaphor, we may give him his musings, or we may penetrate to the heart of the matter?

hopefully this gif will explain:

https://i.imgur.com/memr01c.gifv

the penetration:

ah c'est la vie, the stuff of love's eternal torment. shall we enter into that dance which imitates both pleasure and struggle? it is obvious to anyone why a suitable rival would be an ideal companion, because we would clearly want an equal if we are interested in the idealistic version of true love. is the heart there, though? do we know for sure that we(and her) are in it for finding an equal, or merely for the love of the game? this is the question, for which a stranger such as myself has not even the remotest qualification to answer.

Clearly Sion is a rampaging revenant who Yorick is trying to put down for his sacrad order of fantasy nerds (Who are secretly jealous since he cam do all the cool fantasy stuff) and Sion is after Riven since she destroyed him top lane.
well yo gon die real quick
The contrary, actually... HEAL HEAL HEAL!!!!!
